Package managers

Class AccountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • managers.AccountManager
  • public class AccountManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the entity labelled Account. Contains the logic to link Account to other classes.
    Since:
    2019-11-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    balad

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AccountManager()
      Checks if array list of Account objects is null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AccountManager

        public AccountManager()
        Checks if array list of Account objects is null. If null, data from the csv file is written to the list.

    • Method Detail

      • addBooking

        public void addBooking​(Account account,
                       Booking booking)

      • getAccountByUsername

        public Account getAccountByUsername​(java.lang.String username)
        Iterates through records to compare given username against list of usernames for an account.
        Parameters:
        username - Unique identification name of the user.
        Returns:
        Account of the user whose username is present in records.

      • isExistingUsername

        public boolean isExistingUsername​(java.lang.String username)
        Iterates through records to compare given username against list of usernames for an account.
        Parameters:
        username - Account name of the user.
        Returns:
        Boolean value to indicate the presence of an account for the user.

      • isMatchingPassword

        public boolean isMatchingPassword​(java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String password)
        Verifies the user's input password matches the one in the given account.
        Parameters:
        username - Account name of the user.
        password - Unique authentication key entered by the user.
        Returns:
        Boolean value to indicate whether the input password matches the account's password.

      • isValidPassword

        public boolean isValidPassword​(java.lang.String password)
        Checks if the password entered is valid in terms of length.
        Parameters:
        password - Unique authentication key entered by the user.
        Returns:
        Boolean value to indicate whether the input password is of appropriate length.

      • login

        public int login​(java.lang.String username,
                 java.lang.String password)
        Controls the ability of an user to enter the system.
        Parameters:
        username - Account name of the user.
        password - Unique authentication key entered in by the user.
        Returns:
        Error if username or password does not match.

      • create

        public int create​(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  java.lang.String confirmPassword,
                  int age,
                  java.lang.String mobileNumber,
                  java.lang.String emailAddress)
        Creates a single account given the username and password and user details.
        Parameters:
        username - New username given by user.
        password - New password given by the user.
        confirmPassword - Verifies that the given password is the same as the password to be confirmed.
        age - Age given by the user.
        mobileNumber - Contact number given by the user.
        emailAddress - Email address given by the user.
        Returns:
        A new account if the input details are correct and an error if any of the input details are wrong.
